arm_group.description: Patients receiving surgical intervention for an intracranial arterial-venous malformation.
Patients receiving surgical intervention for a ruptured intracranial aneurysm.
Patients receiving surgical intervention for an unruptured intracranial aneurysm.

biospec_descr.textblock:
Tissue samples of intracranial arterial-venous malformations (AVM) or aneurysm and blood
      samples.

brief_summary.textblock:
Test single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNP's) in ruptured and unruptured aneurysm tissue to
      identify a genetic difference between the two types of aneurysms; and to test SNP's in
      arteriovenous malformation tissue to identify a genetic link.

clinical_study.brief_title: Genome-wide Analysis of Single Nucleotide Polymorphisms of Brain Arteriovenous Malformations and Cerebral Aneurysm

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  All adult patients between the ages of 18 and 89 that are having open surgical
             resection of an AVM or clipping of an aneurysm will be included

        Exclusion Criteria:

clinical_study.official_title: Genome-wide Analysis of Single Nucleotide Polymorphisms of Brain Arteriovenous Malformations and Cerebral Aneurysm

primary_outcome.description: The samples will be frozen after collection and then analyzed.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Within one week of sample collection.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.source: State University of New York - Upstate Medical University

lead_sponsor.agency: State University of New York - Upstate Medical University

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case Control, Time Perspective: Prospective
